line.text: How can I then return in happy plight
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: That am debarred the benefit of rest
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: When day oppression is not eased by night
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: But day by night and night by day oppressed
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And each (though enemies to either reign)
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Do in consent shake hands to torture me
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: The one by toil the other to complain
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: How far I toil still farther off from thee
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: I tell the day to please him thou art bright
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And dost him grace when clouds do blot the heaven
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: So flatter I the swart-complexioned night
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: When sparkling stars twire not thou gild the even
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: But day doth daily draw my sorrows longer
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And night doth nightly make grief length seem stronger
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
